Package hepple.postag

Class Summary
Lexicon A HashMap that maps from lexical entry (String) to possible POS categories (List
POSTagger A Java POS Tagger Author: Mark Hepple (hepple@dcs.shef.ac.uk) Input: An ascii text file in "Brill input format", i.e. one sentence per line, tokens separated by spaces.
Rule  
 

Exception Summary
InvalidRuleException Title: HepTag Description: Mark Hepple's POS tagger Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: University of Sheffield
